VpcId.description: Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) Id from which AccessPoint will allow requests.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified AccessPoint.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified AccessPoint.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 20  

Maximum Length: 2048  

Pattern: ^arn:[^:]+:s3-outposts:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:outpost\/[^:]+\/accesspoint\/[^:]+$  

Update requires: No interruption

Bucket.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the bucket you want to associate this AccessPoint with.
Bucket.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the bucket you want to associate this AccessPoint with.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 20  

Maximum Length: 2048  

Pattern: ^arn:[^:]+:s3-outposts:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:outpost\/[^:]+\/bucket\/[^:]+$  

Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
A name for the AccessPoint.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 3  

Maximum Length: 50  

Pattern: ^[a-z0-9]([a-z0-9\\-]*[a-z0-9])?$  

Update requires: No interruption

VpcConfiguration.description: Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) from which requests can be made to the AccessPoint.
VpcConfiguration.markdownDescription:
Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) from which requests can be made to the AccessPoint.

---

Required: No

Type:      

Update requires: No interruption

Policy.description: The access point policy associated with this access point.
Policy.markdownDescription:
The access point policy associated with this access point.

---

Required: No

Type: object     

Update requires: No interruption
